text: Padam may refer to: *"Padam... Padam...", a song by Édith Piaf *a place in Ladakh of India, see Padum *an indigenous people of India, see Padam (tribe) *Padam, a piece of love poetry in Indian literature, that can be turned into a musical composition and danced for Indian Classical Dance *PADAM, partial androgen deficiency in aging males, another term for andropause
title: Padam
